title: Data Science Practical Competency Enhancement: Handwriting Quality Improvement Strategies through Chinese Character Structure Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Recognition of at least 500 basic Chinese characters and understanding of basic stroke order
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of Chinese character structural elements (stroke count, direction, form) on handwriting stability with 85% accuracy.
Learners can write 20 problematic Chinese characters containing hook/bend strokes without symmetry errors at a 75%+ success rate.
Learners can establish a correction plan to improve the handwriting quality of Chinese characters in business documents by 40% using structural analysis tables.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
